txt.en: A war-party approaches Lang Rhuven from the east to reinforce the Easterlings there.
You should return to Candúr, who can be found at a small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.
Defeat the war-party entering Lang Rhuven
Stand your ground and defeat the war-party
A war-party will be entering Lang Rhuven from the eastern end of the encampment.\n\nYou should defeat the war-party before they get to the camp.
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not leave the eastern end of Lang Rhuven unguarded</rgb>
Do not let the war-party into Lang Rhuven
You have let the war-party into Lang Rhuven!
'Another victory! Well done! We have compromised and thwarted the Easterlings at Lang Rhuven at every turn. I, for one, no longer fear the last or the poison of their sting.'

'It seems we may have a slight problem. Your previous efforts in Lang Rhuven did not go unnoticed. Now a war-party has been spotted on the road east of Lang Rhuven; they must have been dispatched to reinforce the encampment. You and your allies must make haste to the edge of the eastern road in Lang Rhuven and prevent the war-party from joining up with the rest of the Easterling forces.'
A war-party will be entering Lang Rhuven from the eastern end of the encampment.\n\nYou should defeat the war-party before they get to the camp.
